title: SHIP_MISSION
description:
The shipment mission data is actually a point that the air vehicle can take off from or ship to.
The shipment flight altitude will be taken fron the air vehicleoperational flight altitude.
When the air vehicle will pass the route PNR the altitude will set according to the shiping point alt so it is important to set the exact altitude of both the take off shipment point and the destination shipment point

dynamicPartAltType.description: If forceByRoute exists - If set to forceByRoute_Alt, the dynamic routes will have the alts of the first and the last points of the static route

staticPartAltType.description: If forceByRoute exists - If isAGL is false, staticPartAltType needs to be set to "manualAlt" in order to allow points in static route to be AGL/ASL
